title: Sci-Fi - Sound Effects
description: Now your sci-fi game will have high quality sounds for many different actions! :)
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


This pack was created thinking about sounding animations related to science fiction. In it you'll find sounds from several different scenarios, such as reloading a weapon, opening a door, errors, beeps, among many others.


Some sounds have generic names like "beep" because you can use it in different scenarios, it can be a digital panel, the player typing a password, even an alarm, so a sound can serve you for more than one thing.


This pack also has some analog sounds thinking for some time when the player runs out of "energy" and needs to fiddle with some buttons.


With all this I believe that your player's experience will go to another level. By investing in this package you take all that and still help me to continue creating quality sound effects at a nice price. And You’ll get 5 Bonus laser sounds that you’re not paying for :D


Check the preview

Check the documentation


Here's the list of folders for you, remember that each folder has more than one file, you'll get 103 files in total and more 15 bonus laser sounds.


  • Alarm_01
  • Beep_01
  • Big_Gun_01
  • Distant_Door_01
  • Door_01
  • Elevator_Button_01
  • Engine_01
  • Error_01
  • Explosion_01
  • Glitch_01
  • KeyCard_Accept_01
  • KeyCard_Locked_01
  • Malfunction_01
  • Recharge_01
  • Riser_01
  • Searching_01
  • Shut_Down_01
  • SoundScape_01
  • Switch_01
  • Ufo_01
  • Ufo_Pass_By_01
  • Upgrade_01
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 118 (103 in the pack + 15 bonus)

Number of Audio Cues: 118 (103 in the pack + 15 bonus)

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) The soundscapes and the sfx with 'loop' in the name, does loop.

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the image is distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay.
